author: ate
msg: Adding preliminary InitDbMojo which already can process configured sql scripts, but not (yet) seed the database using the JetspeedSerializer (will follow later).
Also enhanced the UnpackResourcesMojo and generalized common functionality of both Mojos into a new UnpackResources helper class.
The resources jar isn't specified anymore as project dependency, but will be downloaded (if needed) automatically by the Mojos and then installed in the local repository.

author: ate
msg: Adding example of new/changed required database configuration settings which are needed by the new init-db maven-2 plugin (which first preliminary version I will commit shortly)
I'm currently testing with PostgreSQL so for now the changes are only for that database type, but it is the same for all other types.
Warning: as I've switched schema/ddl generation from Torque to DdlUtils, database name's have changed too: please check the appropriate name for your database (version) on the DdlUtils website.

author: ate
msg: Restoring trunk version of m2 settings.xml.sample
